name: Saving The Last Petal
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME IS UNFINISHED. FULL GAME WILL BE UPLOADED TOMORROW 

We all know Magical Girls are usually very cute and bubbly, joy and laughter… but how about a story of a magical girl who’s at the end of her life beside a mere human who has shown only kindness and love towards her?

Theme: [Great Fortune] 

([Kitten] of [Great Fortune]) 

Story:-

A girl in a fantasizing outfit appeared in your garden. “That’s not normal”  was what Atsuo was thinking. With only a petal left, Yua’s breath could be her last anytime. After the discovery of Yua, Atsuo gave his best to give Yua the best moments of her life before she goes. But there might be another way. Atsuo could either trade his life for Yua or let Yua go. What decision will Atsuo make based on you?

Features:-

Completely free gameplay! (Donations would be appreciated though)

5 endings, with EIGHT unlockable CGs and a Music Box feature

A story consisting of 6K+ words in total

An original soundtrack, GUI, and original sprites, backgrounds and CGs!

Three talented voice actors!

And some cute dialogue and a hamster.

Characters:- Credits:-

Directed and story by Ra~Chan

Co-written and proofread by Alexia Tea

Developed by Black Mage

Art by Otoke [Sprite Artist], Isabelle [Background Artist] ,  Runori [CG Art] and crumbletier [Item Artist]

Designed by Annie [Promotional Materials], Abbeylily [Logo Designer] and Butterfly Post [GUI Designer]

Music by Greenbean

Video Edited by Héctor Almeida

Voice Actors:

  • Anthony B. Perez [Atsuo Himura]
  • Vera Tan [Yua Aoki]
  • Emily Joann [Maggie]
Additional Credits:-

Credit Code by Gaming Variety Potato

Sound Effects by Pixabay
